data.title: Naini Papers
data.meta_description:
Naini Papers | 10,385 followers on LinkedIn. Ethically Firm, Environmentally Strong | About Us

A leading manufacturer of writing & printing paper and copier paper in India with a production capacity of 120,000 tons per annum.

Quality Certifications

The company has ISO 9001:2015 certification for maintaining high standards of quality and ISO 14001:2015 for setting high standards of environmental compliances and eco-friendly technologies. The company is also certified with OHSAS 45001:2018 for its commitment towards operational health and safety.
data.text:
About Us A leading manufacturer of writing & printing paper and copier paper in India with a production capacity of 120,000 tons per annum. Quality Certifications The company has ISO 9001:2015 certification for maintaining high standards of quality and ISO 14001:2015 for setting high standards of environmental compliances and eco-friendly technologies. The company is also certified with OHSAS 45001:2018 for its commitment towards operational health and safety. Products We are continuously working towards the improvement of quality of existing products as well as development of new products to serve the growing needs of the customers. Outs products range includes non â€“surface sized, surface sized and copier paper. Production lines We have two production lines with state-of-the-art-technology for pulp and paper manufacturing and stringent quality control. Automation and control A great emphasis has been laid on automation of various processes to improve the production efficiency and product quality. Environmental Effectiveness We are highly environment conscious company that has established benchmark in optimum utilization of resources. The quantity and quality of discharge effluent is a benchmark in the industry. Associated Global Partners We are proud to be associated with global manufacturers like Valmet, Voith, Andritz, Siemens, ABB, Pasaban and many more. CSR We have been working for the improvement of infrastructure and quality of education in government school in the state of Uttarakhand. We have adopted 50 government schools for a period of 10 years.

Website

http://www.nainigroup.com
